LINE.Description: Real personal income (thousands of chained (2009) dollars)
LINE.Definition: Real personal income for states and metropolitan areas is personal income divided by the RPPs and the national PCE price index. The result is a chained dollar (using 2009 as the base year) estimate of real personal income.

LINE.Description: Real per capita personal income (chained (2009) dollars)
LINE.Definition: Real per capita personal income for states and metropolitan areas is the real personal income divided by midyear population.
